sn47.28:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn47.28:1.3: “katamesam, avuso anuruddha, dhammanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto”ti?
sn47.28:1.4: “Catunnam, avuso, satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn47.28:2.2: Idhaham, avuso, kaye kayanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.28:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.28:2.6: Imesam khvaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta mahabhinnatam patto.
sn47.28:2.7: Imesanca panaham, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta sahassam lokam abhijanami”ti.
